content: **free pattern ** https //www sweetsofties com/2021/11/penis html penis-chan is a quick and easy project that you can whip up in no time this chibi amigurumi is a no-sew project that is crocheted completely in one piece it makes a cute keychain or a great gag gift it s easily customizable with different yarn colors and add-ons such as bowties and hats a full video tutorial is available ~~~ **size ** height 4 inches 10 cm though easily adjustable by adding/removing rounds **level ** ★★☆☆☆ familiar beginner requires familiarity with stitches used below and changing yarn colors **stitches/terms us terms ** fo = fasten_off magic_ring = magic_ring increase = increase decrease = decrease single_crochet = single_crochet flo = front loops only **materials ** medium weight yarn in desired colors i used peach and pink 3 25mm crochet hook 6mm plastic safety eyes stuffing yarn needle scissors ~~~ this pattern is © 2021 sweet softies for personal use only you may not translate copy alter or sell this pattern in any way you may not make a video or teach a class using my patterns without my written consent you may sell finished items made with this pattern if you credit sweet softies as the designer and link to my blog www sweetsofties com no wholesale * www instagram com/sweetsofties @sweetsofties www etsy com/shop/sylemn www facebook com/sweetsofties www youtube com/sweetsofties www pinterest com/sweetsofties
